definition: lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
fowl/chicken/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(slang) prostitute
to warn/to admonish
monkey/CL:隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: A tenacious auditor might want to make an example out of you.
sentences.chinese: 某个固执的审计员说不定想拿你来杀鸡儆猴。

sentences.english: Gowardesh to consolidate position, decided to scare.
sentences.chinese: 狗娃为巩固地位，决定杀鸡儆猴。

sentences.english: You were too busy making an example out of her to find the key that she left with me.
sentences.chinese: 你只想着用她来杀鸡儆猴，没想到找她留给我的钥匙。

definition: lit. to kill a chicken in front of a monkey; fig. to make an example of sb (by punishment) to frighten others
lit. kill one to warn a hundred (idiom); to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
a deliberate show of strength as a warning
in order to warn against following bad examples (idiom)/as a warning to others
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom); to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
lit. killing the chicken to scare the monkey (idiom); to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
lit. to punish a little to prevent a lot (idiom); to criticize former mistakes firmly to prevent large scale repetition
variant of 殺一儆百|杀一儆百[sha1 yi1 jing3 bai3]
to take drastic measures to deal with a situation/to pull the carpet from under sb
lit. settling accounts after the autumn harvest (idiom); to wait until the time is ripe to settle accounts/to bide time for revenge
to lend sb a knife to kill sb/to get sb else to do one's dirty work/to attack using the strength of another (idiom)
lit. punish one, warn one hundred (idiom)/fig. to make an example of sb
to awe/to intimidate
to cut weeds and eliminate the roots (idiom); to destroy root and branch/to eliminate completely
to use the current topic to put over one's own ideas/to use sth as a pretext to make a fuss
